findings.title: MTS - Misleading Total Supply
findings.description: The `totalSupply` function returns the total supply minus the balance of the zero address, which is misleading.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, making the code less readable and maintainable.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The pragma version is not locked, which can lead to unexpected behavior or vulnerabilities.
